name: Unstable Wall of Elements
description: Create an unstable elemental barrier in front of you, dealing 316 Magic Damage to enemies in the target area every 1 second before exploding for an additional 1799 Magic Damage.  Unstable Wall of Fire deals additional damage to Burning enemies.  Unstable Wall of Frost costs more, but grants damage shields and immobilizes Chilled enemies.  Unstable Wall of Storms sets Concussed enemies Off Balance.
effectLines: The wall explodes when it expires, dealing additional damage.
coefDescription: Create an unstable elemental barrier in front of you, dealing $1 Magic Damage to enemies in the target area every 1 second before exploding for an additional $2 Magic Damage.  Unstable Wall of Fire deals additional damage to Burning enemies.  Unstable Wall of Frost costs more, but grants damage shields and immobilizes Chilled enemies.  Unstable Wall of Storms sets Concussed enemies Off Balance.
rawDescription:
Create an unstable elemental barrier in front of you, dealing <<1>> to enemies in the target area every <<2>> before exploding for an additional <<3>> Magic Damage.

Unstable Wall of Fire deals additional damage to Burning enemies.

Unstable Wall of Frost costs more, but grants damage shields and immobilizes Chilled enemies.

Unstable Wall of Storms sets Concussed enemies Off Balance.
